name: PUZZLE PRISM
description:
1 puzzle game, "PUZZLE PRISM"!!

This masterpiece got high popularity from both users and media.
Simple rule and sophisticated touch control gives you full of thrill and excitement!

[How to play]
Flick left/right to rotate blocks.
 Flick down to drop blocks.

  1. Fill a level completely to clear it.
  2. Explosion occurs when it's filled!
  3. Do it on and on, then you will see a huge explosion!

[What's good]
-4 game modes won't make you tired of playing.(Full version)
-Global leaderboard!(Full version)
-Variety of achievements!(Full version)
-6 fantastic BGM bring gameplay to a climax!(3 for Lite version)
